column1: '''John Haward''' was the author of the video game ''[[Shadows of Mordor]]''<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/som.html Shadows of Mordor] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 3 December 2010)</ref><ref>[http://ifdb.tads.org/viewgame?id=fvvyotspkgrb223k Shadows of Mordor] at the Interactive Fiction Database (retrieved 3 December 2010)</ref> and [[Crack of Doom Software Adventure]].<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/crackofdoom.html Crack of Doom Software Adventure] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 29 December 2010)</ref><ref>[http://www.mobygames.com/game/crack-of-doom Crack of Doom Software Adventure] at Moby Games (retrieved 29 December 2010)</ref>
